          <title>
            <string language="en">Territorial Behavior in Lizards</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comportement territorial dans les lézards</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Animated experiment which demonstrates territorial behavior in lizards, its costs and benefits.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebhaftes Experiment, das territoriales Verhalten

          </description>
